HIDE_NATIVE_BUTTONS_NOTE: Hide image buttons in messages context menu
DISABLE_ANTI_ALIASING_NOTE: Disable anti aliasing image in lens
RESIZE_IMAGES_NOTE: Increase the size of images in modals
LENS_BORDER_COLOR_NOTE: The default is the "interactive-hover" color of your theme
ZOOM_RATIO_NOTE: Magnifying the image in the lens
NOT_HOSTING_DISCORD: The image is probably not hosted by Discord
IMAGE_SAVING_PATH_NOTE: By default, saves to the downloads folder, otherwise to the plugin folder (Due to technical limitations, only manual input is available)
